name: More tab title space
description:
*** This style works with some themes, but it can be modified to work with any theme. ***

This style gives the tab title all the available tab space when it's not hovered.

*** UPDATES ***

01-11-10: This style now succeeds style 19956.
08-07-09: Resolved conflict with tabs in Firefox's Options window.
08-01-09: Removed tab favicon when not hovered to improve theme compatibility.
08-01-09: Removed code for close button on right side.
08-01-09: Added code for close button on right side.
